content.title: BoardGameGeek | Gaming Unplugged Since 2000
content.metaDescription: The definitive source for tabletop games. Find millions of ratings, reviews, videos, photos, and more from our community.
content.content:
## Featured Stories

### [Search the Murky Waters for Gold in Diver Go!](/blog/1/blogpost/178963/search-the-murky-waters-for-gold-in-diver-go)
by [itten games](/blog/1?bloggerid=19428)[BoardGameGeek News](/blog/1/boardgamegeek-news)


- ### [Designer Diary: Winnie the Pooh: Serious Detective](/blog/1/blogpost/178207/designer-diary-how-to-stop-being-afraid-of-heffalu) by [Oleg Meleshin](/blog/1?bloggerid=19344)[BoardGameGeek News](/blog/1/boardgamegeek-news)

- ### [SPIEL Essen 25 Preview](/geekpreview/78/spiel-essen-25-preview) by [W Eric Martin](/profile/W%20Eric%20Martin)

- ### [Designer Diary: The White Castle Duel](/blog/1/blogpost/178435/designer-diary-the-white-castle-duel) by [Shei Santos](/blog/1?bloggerid=11136)[BoardGameGeek News](/blog/1/boardgamegeek-news)

- ### [[BGG STORE] October Store update - Huge restock of Dice Tower promos!](/thread/3591942/bgg-store-october-store-update-huge-restock-of-dic) by [LindyBurger](/profile/LindyBurger)[News](/forum/44/bgg/news)


##  The Hotness [See All](/hotness)
Top 50 trending games today


- ### [1 The Old King's Crown](/boardgame/357873/the-old-kings-crown) Out-manoeuvre your rivals as you vie for control of an ancient, crumbling kingdom.

- ### [2 The Druids of Edora](/boardgame/440007/the-druids-of-edora) Gain prestige as you wander through the magical forest strategically placing dice.

- ### [3 Uprising: Curse of the Last Emperor](/boardgame/284121/uprising-curse-of-the-last-emperor) Lead the Uprising of a formerly enslaved fantasy race against The Empire and Chaos.

- ### [4 Miskatonic Tales: Journey to Innsmouth](/boardgame/429431/miskatonic-tales-journey-to-innsmouth) A sandbox adventure game with map exploration and Choose Your Own Adventure vibe.

- ### [5 The Lord of the Rings: Fate of the Fellowship](/boardgame/436217/the-lord-of-the-rings-fate-of-the-fellowship) As members of The Fellowship, embark on a journey to save—or doom—Middle-earth.

- ### [6 Origin Story](/boardgame/454909/origin-story) Craft a superhero origin story by trick taking and tableau building.

- ### [7 The Elder Scrolls: Betrayal of the Second Era](/boardgame/356080/the-elder-scrolls-betrayal-of-the-second-era) Upgrade your character and gear up to explore the many regions of Tamriel.

- ### [8 Winnie the Pooh: Serious Detective](/boardgame/449448/winnie-the-pooh-serious-detective) Detective adventures of Winnie the Pooh and his friends in 3 famous fiction worlds.

- ### [9 Cascadia: Alpine Lakes](/boardgame/446815/cascadia-alpine-lakes) Create a beautiful alpine environment as you layer habitats and wildlife.

- ### [10 Take Time](/boardgame/440540/take-time) Time beckons you to discover a multitude of challenging universes!

- ### [11 Orloj: The Prague Astronomical Clock](/boardgame/429405/orloj-the-prague-astronomical-clock) Become part of Prague’s legacy by assembling the majestic and intricate Orloj.

- ### [12 Magical Athlete](/boardgame/454103/magical-athlete) A racing game of pure chaos

- ### [13 Vantage](/boardgame/420033/vantage) Cooperatively explore an entire planet's open world from first-person perspectives.

- ### [14 SETI: Search for Extraterrestrial Intelligence](/boardgame/418059/seti-search-for-extraterrestrial-intelligence) Search for signs of alien life by launching probes and analyzing distant signals.

- ### [15 Covenant](/boardgame/429863/covenant) Lead your dwarven clan to reclaim the sacred mountain.

- ### [16 Adamastor](/boardgame/448435/adamastor) A nautical game where multi-use cards and growing traumas test your crew.

- ### [17 Forestry](/boardgame/431493/forestry) Become forest stewards who balance resource harvesting with sustainability.

- ### [18 Tax the Rich](/boardgame/446492/tax-the-rich) Trick-taking game where you can flip the card hierarchy upside down.

- ### [19 The White Castle Duel](/boardgame/438936/the-white-castle-duel) Confront a rival clan in this exclusive two-player version of The White Castle.

- ### [20 Ayar: Children of the Sun](/boardgame/429438/ayar-children-of-the-sun) Advance your clan & seek the favour of the gods at the dawn of the Inca civilisation

- ### [21 Ark Nova](/boardgame/342942/ark-nova) Plan and build a modern, scientifically managed zoo to support conservation projects.

- ### [22 Arcs](/boardgame/359871/arcs) Rule the galaxy with your court, fleet, and cities.

- ### [23 Recall](/boardgame/446493/recall) Explore the lands and discover ancient civilizations to learn from them.

- ### [24 Legions](/boardgame/435810/legions) Play Legions cards and recuit war Heroes to control the districts of Abyss!

- ### [25 Dawn of the Zeds: Designer's Edition](/boardgame/456142/dawn-of-the-zeds-designers-edition) The undead are marching on your town. The nightmare ends only if you win.

- ### [26 Galactic Cruise](/boardgame/391137/galactic-cruise) Build and launch ships to send guests on luxurious space vacations.

- ### [27 HUANG](/boardgame/371688/huang) Unite China under your banner, quash your enemies, and claim the Emperor's throne!

- ### [28 Wingspan](/boardgame/266192/wingspan) Attract a beautiful and diverse collection of birds to your wildlife preserve.

- ### [29 Brass: Birmingham](/boardgame/224517/brass-birmingham) Build networks, grow industries, and navigate the world of the Industrial Revolution.

- ### [30 Slay the Spire: The Board Game](/boardgame/338960/slay-the-spire-the-board-game) Craft a unique deck, discover powerful relics, and Slay the Spire together!

- ### [31 Harmonies](/boardgame/414317/harmonies) Create your own landscape and habitats to welcome animals.

- ### [32 Spirit Island](/boardgame/162886/spirit-island) Island Spirits join forces using elemental powers to defend their home from invaders.

- ### [33 Light Speed: Arena](/boardgame/400498/light-speed-arena) Aim with your tiles to take down enemy spaceships and impress the game sponsors.

- ### [34 Sweet Lands](/boardgame/425445/sweet-lands) Build the richest candy empire to claim the crown of confections.

- ### [35 Aqua Garden](/boardgame/322421/aqua-garden) Collect fish and create a unique aquarium with the aim of becoming the best aquarium.

- ### [36 Bomb Busters](/boardgame/413246/bomb-busters) Players defuse bombs by deducing and cutting unseen wires of different values.

- ### [37 Terraforming Mars](/boardgame/167791/terraforming-mars) Compete with rival CEOs to make Mars habitable and build your corporate empire.

- ### [38 The White Castle](/boardgame/371942/the-white-castle) Become the most influential clan in Japan's Himeji stronghold.

- ### [39 Luthier](/boardgame/371330/luthier) Craft musical instruments for patrons through worker placement and hidden bidding.

- ### [40 Nemesis: Retaliation](/boardgame/381248/nemesis-retaliation) Highly trained marines enter an alien nest with strict orders and advanced tools.

- ### [41 Castle Combo](/boardgame/416851/castle-combo) Draft people from the castle and the village to create a valuable 3x3 tableau.

- ### [42 Cascadia](/boardgame/295947/cascadia) Create the most harmonious ecosystem as you puzzle together habitats and wildlife.

- ### [43 Thesauros](/boardgame/440885/thesauros) Optimise your search for sunken treasures while managing your company.

- ### [44 Lost Ruins of Arnak](/boardgame/312484/lost-ruins-of-arnak) Explore an island to find resources and discover the lost ruins of Arnak.

- ### [45 Heat: Pedal to the Metal](/boardgame/366013/heat-pedal-to-the-metal) Push your car to the limit in the pursuit of victory, but don’t overheat!

- ### [46 Hot Streak](/boardgame/446497/hot-streak) Which mascot will cross the finish line first? Who will be DQ'd?

- ### [47 Amalfi: Renaissance](/boardgame/351594/amalfi-renaissance) A unique mechanism where ships give you actions and also manage your resources.

- ### [48 Flip 7](/boardgame/420087/flip-7) Score the cards in front of you, or take another card, risking everything you hold?

- ### [49 Root](/boardgame/237182/root) Decide the fate of the forest as woodland factions fight for contrasting goals.

- ### [50 The Lord of the Rings: Duel for Middle-earth](/boardgame/421006/the-lord-of-the-rings-duel-for-middle-earth) Play as the Fellowship or Sauron and attempt to determine the fate of Middle-earth.


##  Crowdfunding Countdown [See All](/crowdfunding)
Projects ending soon


- Promoted ### [Cascadia: Alpine Lakes](/boardgame/446815/cascadia-alpine-lakes) Ends Dec 63076 Backers Create a beautiful alpine environment as you layer habitats and wildlife. [Visit Project](/project/link/version/759579?featured=1&location=bggexplorehome)

- ### [Stakeout](/boardgame/410946/stakeout) Ends in 2 hours273 Backers Hard-boiled detectives compete to be the best investigator. [Visit Project](/project/link/version/756095?location=bggexplorehome)

- ### [Academia: A Game of Administrative Bloat](/boardgame/387746/academia-a-game-of-administrative-bloat) Ends in 2 hours134 Backers Players control the boards of directors of large universities, vying for prestige. [Visit Project](/project/link/version/772655?location=bggexplorehome)

- ### [Barrage: The China Challenge](/boardgameexpansion/455455/barrage-the-china-challenge), + 2 more Ends in 6 hours4764 Backers Transform China's landscape while harnessing the Yellow River with pressure conduits. [Visit Project](/project/link/version/775236?location=bggexplorehome)

- ### [Ruinborn: Dungeons of Cabora](/boardgame/440695/ruinborn-dungeons-of-cabora) Ends in 6 hours392 Backers Explore dungeons, battle...
